title: Martin Van Buren National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility         For those who need a wheelchair lift there is one by the north door.   Accommondations The visitor center and park headquarters are accessible to wheelchairs while the first floor of the Lindenwald mansion is wheelchair accessible.   Accessible parking and restrooms are available. Individuals with mobility impairments wishing to tour President van Buren's home should discuss accommodation available with the ranger at the visitor center.  The introductory film, The Red Fox of Kinderhook offers captioning for those with hearing impairments. Please speak to the ranger in the visitor center if you wish to have captioning enabled. While at the visitor center guest may also request a large print version of the park brochure.
